p: The Premna leaf essential oils have been screened for mosquito larvicidal activity against Aedes aegypti and, if sufficient mosquito larvae were available, also against Ae. albopictus and Culex quinquefasciatus. The 24-h and 48-h larvicidal activities are shown in Table 4 and Table 5, respectively. Considering larvicidal activities against Ae. aegypti, the most active Premna leaf essential oils were P. cambodiana (24-h LC 50 = 16.8 μg/mL) and P. mekongensis from Nghe An (24-h LC 50 = 16.8 μg/mL).
